name: Jodah's Avenger
oracle_text: {0}: Until end of turn, Jodah's Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of double strike, protection from red, vigilance, or shadow. (A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)

name: Primal Plasma
oracle_text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.
flavor_text: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

name: Bewilder
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Teferi snapped his fingers, and the viashino started clucking like a chicken. Silly, yes, but exactly the thing we needed to break the stifling tension."
—Jhoira, master artificer

name: Sidewinder Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks a Sliver, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"They encircled our patrol with the stealth of snakes, corralling us like livestock."
—Merrik Aidar, Benalish patrol

name: Outrider en-Kor
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Outrider en-Kor this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.

name: Rebuff the Wicked
oracle_text: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control.
flavor_text:
"I cannot teach you their brand of magic, but I can teach you how to defend against it."
—Tavalus, priest of Korlis

name: Shade of Trokair
oracle_text:
{W}: Shade of Trokair gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Suspend 3—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Thraben Inspector
oracle_text: When Thraben Inspector enters the battlefield, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

name: Adorned Pouncer
oracle_text:
Double strike
Eternalize {3}{W}{W} ({3}{W}{W}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie Cat with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.)

name: Children of Korlis
oracle_text: Sacrifice Children of Korlis: You gain life equal to the life you've lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor_text:
"We have a proud history of self-sacrifice. But it is easy, in these bleak times, to find one among us who is eager to die for any cause."
—Tavalus, acolyte of Korlis

name: Errant Doomsayers
oracle_text: {T}: Tap target creature with toughness 2 or less.
flavor_text: "Heed my words, traveler. Plagues, war, desolation . . . all mere hints of what is yet to come from Dominaria's vault of horrors."

name: Judge Unworthy
oracle_text: Choose target attacking or blocking creature. Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Judge Unworthy deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to that creature. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Benalish Cavalry
oracle_text: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text: "My people swore to protect Benalia to the end. It is battered, but yet stands, as do we."

name: Calciderm
oracle_text:
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
Vanishing 4 (This creature enters the battlefield with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

name: Castle Raptors
oracle_text:
Flying
As long as Castle Raptors is untapped, it gets +0/+2.
flavor_text: "Each place we see is as ruined and lifeless as the last. So here we stay, because this ruin is *ours*."

name: Declaration in Stone
oracle_text: Exile target creature and all other creatures its controller controls with the same name as that creature. That player investigates for each nontoken creature exiled this way.

name: Triumphant Reckoning
oracle_text: Return all artifact, enchantment, and planeswalker cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
